title: chainganginc
author: chainganginc
content: Who thinks this is a good idea? Litecoin seems to be stuck and could use a upgrade. Would like to make it more scarce back to 21 million like bitcoin and maybe a new algo or a str8 fork and make block time faster and more bigger. Would be great to find an exchange to help. Or could start it no premine¬† and add it to exbitron.

Would like to make it more scarce back to 21 million like bitcoin and maybe a new algo or a str8 fork and make block time faster and more bigger. Would be great to find an exchange to help. Litecoin seems to be stuck and could use a upgrade. Would like to make it more scarce back to 21 million like bitcoin and maybe a new algo or a str8 fork and make block time faster and more bigger. comments.body: Quote from: chainganginc on May 27, 2022, 12:15:25 AMYup im going to probably work on it specially if i can get some support.I'd be happy to help

comments.author: chainganginc
comments.body: Quote from: MiningCoinsPool on May 27, 2022, 12:24:12 AMQuote from: chainganginc on May 27, 2022, 12:15:25 AMYup im going to probably work on it specially if i can get some support.I'd be happy to helpIf you can create a logo that would be great i would gave to get a new laptop. I could create a Minecart Toke¬† on Solana's Blockchain for miners from the logo somebody can create. I can connect it to a play to mining game. Then connect that to a play to earn faucet. You can collect Minecarts by playing the game. They will have to¬† be pre mined on Solanas Blockchain. For every minecart you get 10 Litecoin Silvers in a Swap. I Can do a Small Litecoin Silver premine only 100K Coins . So only 10000 Minecarts will be minted on Solanas Blockchain. This can act to Jump start the blockchain.

comments.author: chainganginc
comments.body: The fork has been delayed. stay tuned.

comments.author: chainganginc
comments.body: Quote from: ptaank on June 07, 2022, 06:55:24 AMare you talking about the minecraft game ? or something else ??No im talking about a token on Solanas Blockchain I plan on making.

comments.author: chainganginc
comments.created_time: June 09, 2022, 10:51:31 PMLast edit: June 09, 2022, 11:13:47 PM by chainganginc
comments.body: There will be only 8 Million Minecart Tokens. This will be a different type of forking because there will be no 1 to 1 exchange. Only way to get Litecoin Silver from premine is to play the game i will create and earn through a faucet.¬† ¬†The remaining Coins left to mine will match the remaining max supply of Litecoin. The blockhchain will move faster and have bigger blocks.

comments.author: chainganginc
comments.body: Quote from: ptaank on June 08, 2022, 07:01:45 AMOkay, which will be used to swap it with litecoin silver . yup, you will have to play a dark age mining game and earn the token through a faucet. I will have to manually send Tokens to users but it is a cool game.

comments.body: Quote from: ptaank on June 24, 2022, 08:59:59 AMgame link?Go to www.mycointap.comSign up and go to ptc ads and click on the View Earn Minecart Game.Also get a Solflare wallet so you can generate an address.
